A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the best Star Wars movies of all of them. Finally breaks out of the tired Skywalker destiny plot that has dragged down the series for too long. Glad Disney took a risk with Rian Johnson to give us a genuinely interesting and character driven movie\, rather than JJ Abrams reboot which was essentially a series of tropes and rip offs (albeit fun and enjoyable).\n\nIgnore the rightwing bots\, this movie is worth seeing.
